00023     class vector_2d 
00024     {
00025     public:
00026         vector_2d()
00027         : x_(0.0f)
00028         , y_(0.0f) 
00029         { 
00030         }
00031         
00032         vector_2d(float x, float y)
00033         : x_(x)
00034         , y_(y) 
00035         { 
00036         }
00037         
00038 #ifdef __APPLE__
00039         vector_2d(CGPoint point)
00040         : x_(point.x)
00041         , y_(point.y) 
00042         { 
00043         }
00044 #endif
00045         
00046         vector_2d& operator +=(const vector_2d& v) 
00047         {
00048             x_ += v.x_;
00049             y_ += v.y_;
00050             return (*this);
00051         }
00052         
00053         vector_2d& operator -=(const vector_2d& v) 
00054         {
00055             x_ -= v.x_;
00056             y_ -= v.y_;
00057             return (*this);
00058         }
00059         
00060         vector_2d& operator *=(float t) 
00061         {
00062             x_ *= t;
00063             y_ *= t;
00064             return (*this);
00065         }
00066         
00067         vector_2d& operator /=(float t) 
00068         {
00069             float f = 1.0f / t;
00070             x_ *= f;
00071             y_ *= f;
00072             return (*this);
00073         }
00074         
00075         vector_2d operator -(void) const        
00076         {
00077             return (vector_2d(-x_, -y_));
00078         }        
00079         
00080         vector_2d operator +(const vector_2d& v) const 
00081         {
00082             return (vector_2d(x_ + v.x_, y_ + v.y_));
00083         }
00084         
00085         vector_2d operator -(const vector_2d& v) const 
00086         {
00087             return (vector_2d(x_ - v.x_, y_ - v.y_));
00088         }
00089         
00090         vector_2d operator *(float t) const 
00091         {
00092             return (vector_2d(x_ * t, y_ * t));
00093         }       
00094         
00095         vector_2d operator /(float t) const 
00096         {
00097             float f = 1.0f / t;
00098             return (vector_2d(x_ * f, y_ * f));
00099         }
00100                 
00101         vector_2d& normalize(void) 
00102         {
00103             return (*this /= sqrtf(x_ * x_ + y_ * y_));
00104         }
00105         
00106         bool operator ==(const vector_2d& v) const 
00107         {
00108             return ((x_ == v.x_) && (y_ == v.y_));
00109         }
00110         
00111         bool operator !=(const vector_2d& v) const 
00112         {
00113             return ((x_ != v.x_) || (y_ != v.y_));
00114         }       
00115         
00116         static float dist(const vector_2d& l, const vector_2d& r);
00117         static float dist_squared(const vector_2d& l, const vector_2d& r);
00118         
00119         inline static float mag_squared(const vector_2d& v) 
00120         {
00121             return (v.x_ * v.x_ + v.y_ * v.y_);
00122         }
00123         
00124         inline static float mag(const vector_2d& v) 
00125         {
00126             return (sqrtf(v.x_ * v.x_ + v.y_ * v.y_));
00127         }       
00128 
00129 #ifdef __APPLE__
00130         // Transparent usage of vector_2d as CGPoint
00131         inline operator CGPoint() { return CGPointMake(x_, y_); }
00132         inline operator const CGPoint() const { return CGPointMake(x_, y_); }
00133 #endif
00134         
00135         inline const float X() const { return x_; };
00136         inline const float Y() const { return y_; };
00137         
00138         void X( float x ) { x_ = x; };
00139         void Y( float y ) { y_ = y; };
00140         
00141     private:
00142         float x_;
00143         float y_;
00144     };

00191         float y;

00194     struct rect
00195     {        
00196 #ifdef __APPLE__
00197         rect(const CGRect& r)
00198         : origin(r.origin)
00199         , size(r.size)
00200         {            
00201         }
00202         
00203         inline operator CGRect() { return CGRectMake(origin.x, origin.y, size.width, size.height); }
00204         inline operator const CGRect() const { return CGRectMake(origin.x, origin.y, size.width, size.height); }
00205 #endif
00206         rect(float x, float y, float width, float height)
00207         : origin(x, y)
00208         , size(width, height)
00209         {            
00210         }
00211       
00212         inline bool contains_point(const point& p)
00213         {
00214             if(p.x >= origin.x && p.x <= origin.x+size.width)
00215                 if(p.y >= origin.y && p.y <= origin.y+size.height)
00216                     return true;
00217             
00218             return false;
00219         }
00220         
00221         point origin;
00222         size size;        
00223     };

00225     inline vector_2d operator *(float t, const vector_2d& v) 
00226     {
00227         return (vector_2d(t * v.X(), t * v.Y()));
00228     }

00231     float to_deg( float rad );
00232             
00233     inline float clamp(float v, float min, float max)
00234     {
00235         return fmaxf(min, fminf(v, max));
00236     }

00238     // affine
00239     class affine_matrix 
00240     {
00241         union {
00242             float data_[9];
00243             struct {
00244                 float
00245                 d0, d1, d2,
00246                 d3, d4, d5,
00247                 d6, d7, d8;
00248             };
00249         };
00250         
00251         affine_matrix(float d[]);   // used by static initializers only
00252         
00253     public:
00254         // create identity
00255         affine_matrix()
00256         {
00257             // fill with 0.0f and then make identity
00258             d1=0.0f; d2=0.0f; d3=0.0f;
00259             d0=1.0f; d4=1.0f; d8=1.0f;
00260             d5=0.0f; d6=0.0f; d7=0.0f;
00261         }
00262         
00263         affine_matrix(const affine_matrix& m) 
00264         {
00265             memcpy(data_, m.data_, 9 * sizeof(float));
00266         }
00267         
00268         static const affine_matrix translation(float x, float y);
00269         static const affine_matrix scale(float x, float y);
00270         static const affine_matrix rotate(float angle);
00271         const affine_matrix inverse();
00272         
00273         double determinant_of_minor(int y, int x);
00274         double determinant();
00275         
00276         // apply to a vector and point
00277         vector_2d apply(const vector_2d& v);
00278         point apply(const point& p);
00279         
00280         // operators
00281         affine_matrix& operator *=(const affine_matrix& m);
00282     };
